name: Doodles n Dungeons
description:
Random turn-based doodle dungeon, now with 100% less pitfalls (not at all because we didn't have time to implement them)

Made with lots of love and effort by:

Aleksa (Kawales) https://itch.io/profile/kawales

AncientPear https://clyp.it/user/n2inbmzm

Andrija (thediamondinferno) https://thediamondinferno.itch.io/

Features:

  • Crazy Goofy Music
  • No bugs
  • Best RPG system 2021
  • No win condition (intentional ;)
  • Amazing enemy pathfinding algorithm
  • Experimental keyboard controls

*note - some of the aforementioned features might not be present on all systems

How to play:

If you're stuck for any reason, press escape to end the run and begin the game from the start.

You're free to use the buttons on the ui, but you can also move the player with wasd and arrow keys. Attack with the ui button A or B (also by clicking k, but use on your own responsibility).  When you can't seem to move, that means that your turn is up! Press space or the right-most button to end turn!

Gather items to make yourself stronger!

  • Sword - range +1, damage +1
  • Hammer - damage +1
  • Boots - move per turn +1
  • Chicken leg - hp +2
  • Potion - hp max
  • Whole chicken - hp + 2
  • Wings - Aestheticcc +999999

Track your stats on the right of your screen:

  1. Boots - moves left (including attacking)
  2. Sword - current dmg
  3. Spider (only two eyes visible LOL) - enemies left in the room
  4. Potion - max HP
  5. Chicken leg - current HP

Enemies:

  1. Spider - very intelligent and agile (not).. will randomly move and waste its turn sometimes. If it happens to step on a player, it will politely move back and deal only one dmg in the process.
  2. Skeleton - one cool skelly boi with hard bones. Able to break walls in order to get to player, but will receive 2hp of dmg by doing so. 

Levels:

There are 6 different levels and spawning is randomized, meaning, there might be rooms that don't have enemies (which will be auto skipped because the game is supposed to be at least somewhat difficult). You're able to move to the next level by moving to a teleport (the purple swirly thingy), but only after you kill all enemies, present in the room.

LOUD MUSIC WARNING, PLEASE DO LOWER IT, YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED... or don't, if you want extra immersion :))

--------- CONTAINS FLASHING 64x64 TILES AND SPRITES, PLAYERS PRONE TO SEIZURES, DISCRETION ADVISED -----------

Thank you for reading this extensive description, I spent like 15 mins on it <3
